page.title: 10Methodist Churches
page.content: { Hyssington, Gritt & Old Churchstoke membership totals are 16,6 & 14 res- pectively form the Cordon Group in the Bishops Castle and Clun Circuit.Super- intendant - Reverend Maurice Wright. We preach traditional methodist doctrine with an{emphasis on personal {salvation and social redemption. Sunday services start at 6-30pm at Old Churchstoke & Hyssington, 2-30pm at Gritt, are taken by the minister and local preachers. Cordon Group have monthly united services and prayer meetings. Christian Endeavour,Home & Overseas meetings are held during winter. We have a{Circuit Praise Group {and choir.}Hyssington has a new electronic organ. There are also plans, newsletter and class tickets quarterly. The Church Councils meet twice yearly.
